pr_title: Temporarily revert jacoco integration to unblock Edge

timeline.message: Temporarily revert jacoco integration to unblock Edge

timeline.bodyText: we should really just not create these tasks for non-debug variants.
timeline.author: AdamBJohnsonx
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -99,10 +99,10 @@ android {
         }
 
         // create separate code coverage tasks(for unitTests, androidTests and both Tests) for every build variant
-        def buildVariant = variant.name
-        createCoverageTask(buildVariant, unitTestType)
-        createCoverageTask(buildVariant, androidTestType)
-        createCoverageTask(buildVariant, bothTestType)
+//        def buildVariant = variant.name
+//        createCoverageTask(buildVariant, unitTestType)
+//        createCoverageTask(buildVariant, androidTestType)
+//        createCoverageTask(buildVariant, bothTestType)

replies.bodyText: Yes I will follow up with Ayush to fix this in a new PR
replies.author: shahzaibj
